00001 #ifndef DUNE_FOAMGRID_LEAFITERATOR_HH
00002 #define DUNE_FOAMGRID_LEAFITERATOR_HH
00003 
00008 namespace Dune {
00009 
00010 
00014 template<int codim, PartitionIteratorType pitype, class GridImp>
00015 class FoamGridLeafIterator :
00016     public Dune::FoamGridEntityPointer <codim,GridImp>
00017 {
00018     enum {dim      = GridImp::dimension};
00019     enum {dimworld = GridImp::dimensionworld};
00020 
00021 public:
00022 
00023     FoamGridLeafIterator(const GridImp& grid) 
00024         : FoamGridEntityPointer <codim,GridImp>(NULL),
00025           grid_(&grid)
00026     {
00027 
00029         const int fullRefineLevel = 0;
00030         
00031         const std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld> >& entities = Dune::get<dim-codim>(grid_->entityImps_[fullRefineLevel]);
00032         // The &* turns an iterator into a plain pointer
00033         this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(&*entities.begin());
00034         levelIterator_ = entities.begin();
00035 
00036         if (!this->virtualEntity_.getTarget()->isLeaf())
00037             increment();
00038     }
00039 
00041     FoamGridLeafIterator() 
00042         : FoamGridEntityPointer <codim,GridImp>(NULL),
00043           grid_(NULL)
00044     {}
00045 
00047     void increment() {
00048         // Increment until you find a leaf entity
00049         do {
00050             globalIncrement();
00051 
00052         } while (levelIterator_!=Dune::get<dim-codim>(grid_->entityImps_[grid_->maxLevel()]).end() 
00053                  && !this->virtualEntity_.getTarget()->isLeaf());
00054     }
00055 
00056 private:
00057 
00059     void globalIncrement() {
00060 
00061         // Backup current level because it may not be accessible anymore after
00062         // setting the pointer to the next entity.
00063         const int oldLevel = this->virtualEntity_.level();
00064 
00065         // Increment on this level
00066         ++levelIterator_;
00067         this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(&(*levelIterator_));
00068         if (levelIterator_==Dune::get<dim-codim>(grid_->entityImps_[oldLevel]).end())
00069             this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(NULL);
00070 
00071         // If beyond the end of this level set to first of next level
00072         if (levelIterator_==Dune::get<dim-codim>(grid_->entityImps_[oldLevel]).end() && oldLevel < grid_->maxLevel()) {
00073 
00074             const std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld> >& entities = Dune::get<dim-codim>(grid_->entityImps_[oldLevel+1]);
00075             levelIterator_ = entities.begin();
00076             this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(&*entities.begin());
00077 
00078         }
00079 
00080     }
00081 
00082     // /////////////////////////////////////
00083     //   Data members
00084     // /////////////////////////////////////
00085     const GridImp* grid_;
00086 
00087     // This iterator derives from FoamGridEntityPointer, and that base class stores the value
00088     // of the iterator, i.e. the 'pointer' to the entity.  However, that pointer can not be
00089     // set to its successor in the level std::list, not even by magic.  Therefore we keep the
00090     // same information redundantly in this iterator, which can be incremented.
00091     typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld> >::const_iterator levelIterator_;
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 }  // namespace Dune
00096   
00097 #endif
